title: Photostat, "Proposed Hostelry: Center for American Visitors to the Paris Expo, 1925", 1923
medium: Photostat and black ink on paper
signed: Bottom right in black ink: Dresse par la Delegation/ de Groupe des Architectes/ Modernes/ Hector Guimard/ Henri Sauvage/ Vice Presidents du Groupe/ Louis Brachet/ Joachim Richard et/ Georges Roehrich
inscribed:
Top in black ink: GROUPE DES ARCHITECTES MODERNES 
Bottom left in black ink: HOTEL DE VOYAGEURS/ MAISON AMERICAINE/ IMMEUBLES DE RAPPORT/ CONSTRUCTIONS DEFINITIVES/ POUR LOGER LES VISITEURS/ DE L'EXPOSITION DES ARTS/ DECORATIFS DE 1925/ REZ DE CHAUSSEE
description: Design for lodgements of visitors for the 1925 Paris exposition. The design shows the different living quarters for guests as well as function rooms. Rooms labelled and scale noted throughout design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Proposed Hostelry: Center for American Visitors to the Paris Expo, 1925", 1923.
1923. Photostat and black ink on paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-49.
